title: Blog Birthday & Giveaway
content:
Giveaway ~ Handmade Kalamkari Apron

Sailuâ€™s Kitchen is 6 years old and I am celebrating my blog anniversary with a giveaway. I am giving away 4 Handmade Kalamkari aprons designed by me to 4 lucky winners. 

To participate in the giveaway, visit the apron giveaway page and leave your name and email address and you might be a lucky winner of a Kalamkari Handmade Apron. This giveaway is open to readers till 15th November, 2011 (midnight India time). 

I want to take this opportunity to thank each and everyone, my blogging colleagues and friends, facebook readers and visitors of my blog. Thank you, my dear readers, from the bottom of my heart for your continued support and love. I am truly blessed!
